name: Arcanum
description: This installer downloads and installs the italian translation 1.0
notes: You will need to download also the other IT translation mods and install them sequentially.
content:
files:
- patch: http://www.old-computer-mags.net/traduzioni/arcanum/ArcanumITA_10_testi_video.rar
game:
  arch: win32
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- extract:
    description: Extracting the patch
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/
    file: $patch
    format: rar
- task:
    description: Running the Patch
    executable: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/ITA PATCH.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
requires: arcanum
